response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $800,000 based on your needs and requirements. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, providing you with access to a high-quality asset while allowing us to maximize the value of our product. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how we can make this a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
